title: TFCenthusiast
author: TFCenthusiast
content: Godess Hestia Anime NFT, price 0.056 BTC. Please DM me on discord to buy The image exists as an NFT on the BTC blockchain.You can preview the image on this discord link:https://discord.com/channels/1169215407840841858/1169218039061938287/1171814035533070398Can it be copied or screenshot?No because both QR and Original versions of the images are encoded with BTC public key (download the image, right click and open with notepad and scroll to bottom to view public key)Can't anyone just change the encoding? No because the original (version without QR) is kept private, so then the QR version and original version won't match.How to buy:Message me or send me a direct message on discord.What will you receive after purchase?Original image with encodingQR image for resellingPaper Wallet with Private key connected to the NFT image
